Package com.example.braiveassignment.controllers

Class FlightController

java.lang.Object
com.example.braiveassignment.controllers.FlightController
@Controller
public class FlightController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the controller for all internal calls executed when user uses the graphical interface

    java.lang.String createFlight​(FlightsEntity flight, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
    This is the url used for creating a flight
    java.lang.String deleteFlight​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, int id)
    This is the url when user wants to delete a flight Deletion is done by using id as parameter.
    java.lang.String editFlight​(FlightsEntity flight, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
    This url is used for updating a flight.
    java.lang.String findPaginated​(int pageNumber, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    This is a helper method that offers pagination for the results
    java.lang.String getAll​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    Since thymeleaf is used as a template engine, a model variable is required for passing values between calls This url is the home url and displays the list of all flihgts as well as the buttons that can be used for CRUD operations
    java.lang.String getFlight​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, int id)
    This is the url that takes the field values of a flight with a specific id and displays them as default values im the update windows
    java.lang.String getFlightInfo​(FlightsEntity flight, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
    This is the url used for getting the data of the update form
    java.lang.String initFlight​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    This url provides an empty form for adding the fields when creating a new flight
    java.lang.String initSearch​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    this is the url that gives an empty search form to the user
    java.lang.String showResults​(int pageNumber, int pageSize, SearchCriteria search, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
    this is the url that does the actual search.
    java.lang.String showSuccess()
    This is the url for succesful results

      Since thymeleaf is used as a template engine, a model variable is required for passing values between calls This url is the home url and displays the list of all flihgts as well as the buttons that can be used for CRUD operations
